setRhoRandomGenerator

public void setRhoRandomGenerator(java.util.Random rhoRandomGenerator)
Sets the random number generator used in the GC update equation. The default is KnuthSubtractive.

Parameters:
rhoRandomGenerator - The Random generator used in the GC update.
